title: Dutch ‘Draghi report’ identifies life sciences and biotech as key pillars [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: The Netherlands has the building blocks of a strong life sciences sector, but a report adapting Draghi’s EU findings to the Dutch context says several gaps are holding it back
summary_public: The Netherlands has the building blocks of a strong life sciences sector, but a report adapting Draghi’s EU findings to the Dutch context says several gaps are holding it back

NL.label: mixed
NL.evidence: Netherlands has building blocks... but several gaps are holding it back
